python_tracer.Fitting2D package

Submodules

python_tracer.Fitting2D.create_locPALMTracer module

python_tracer.Fitting2D.create_locPALMTracer.fill_locPALMTracer_file(image_size, planes, centroids, sigmasX, sigmasY, integrated_intensity)[source]

This function initializes and fills two dict() compatible with PALMTracer file format :param image_size: return of np.shape, (z, y, x) format :param planes: int, number of planes (image_size[0]) :param centroids: arrays of (float, float), molecules coordinates :param sigmasX: arrays of float, sigmaX values :param sigmasY: arrays of float, sigmaY values :param integrated_intensity: arrays of float, integrated intensity values

Returns:

dictionnary containing PALMTracer file future header localization_pt: dictionnary containing PALMTracer file future content

Return type:

metadata_pt

python_tracer.Fitting2D.create_locPALMTracer.from_plane_to_index(planes)[source]

This function generates index list from list of plane :param Planes: array of int

Returns:

list of int

Return type:

transformed_list

eg: [1, 1, 1, 1, 2, 2, 2, 3, 3, 4, 4, 4, 5, 5] Out [1, 2, 3, 4, 1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 1, 2, 3, 1, 2]

python_tracer.Fitting2D.do_fit_and_gallery module

python_tracer.Fitting2D.do_fit_and_gallery.do_fit_and_gallery(path_stack, threshold=180.0, size_ROI_fit=7, size_ROI_crop=8, number_of_ROI_per_line=5)[source]

This function does a Gaussian fit, crop detected PSFs, creates a gallery of ROIs and save it as well as localizations file. :param path_stack: str, path of data :param threshold: float, threshold used for the gaussian fitting :param size_ROI_fit: int, size of the ROI (nxn) for PSF detection for the gaussian fitting :param size_ROI_crop: int, size of the ROI (nxn) for PSF cropping and gallery making :param number_of_ROI_per_line: int, number of ROIs per line in the gallery of PSFs

Returns:

None

python_tracer.Fitting2D.do_fit_and_loc_file module

python_tracer.Fitting2D.do_fit_and_loc_file.do_fit_and_loc_file(path_stack, threshold=180.5, size_ROI_fit=7)[source]

This function does a Gaussian fit and save the output as a PALMTracer-like localizations file. :param path_stack: str, path of data :param threshold: float, threshold used for the gaussian fitting :param size_ROI_fit: int, size of the ROI (nxn) for PSF detection for the gaussian fitting

Returns:

None

Parse locPALMTracer text file. :param file: str, locPALMTracer file pathway

data: pd.Dataframe for locs file coordinates: list of loc coordinates
